name: Marge in Chains
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Bill Oakley, Josh Weinstein
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: A misunderstanding leads to Marge being imprisoned for shoplifting. In her absence, the family, and eventually, the town itself, descend into chaos.
